title: Cube Wave by Bees and Bombs
description: The artist BeesandBombs makes amazing algorithmic looping GIFs! Here's my attempt to recreate one of my favorite GIFs in JavaScript with p5.js and the WEBGL renderer.

timestamps.title: Coding Cube Wave by Bees and Bombs
Final wave and suggestion for improvements

codeExamples.title: Cube Wave
codeExamples.description: This sketch recreates one of my favorite gifs by artist Bees and Bombs.

links.title: Simple Harmonic Motion
links.description: In this video, I demonstrate how to use the sin() function in p5.js to simulate simple harmonic motion.

links.title: Back to School on the Coding Train
links.description: Demo on how to use Movie Maker tool in Processing to make GIF loop using code from Cube Wave by Bees and Bombs challenge
